title: The Hunger Audit
coreTruth: You are confusing the Adult's Lust for the Child's Fear.

signal.title: The Wolf at the Door
signal.content: A starving wolf dissolves into a cold child. Voiceover: 'Stop feeding the Wolf. Hold the Child.'

academy.title: The Anatomy of Want
academy.content: Tracey (Inner Child) signals 'Unsafe.' The Body translates it as 'Lust.' You aren't addicted to people; you are addicted to safety.

nexus.title: Enlightenment Now: Page 61
nexus.quote: I didn't become cold. I became Whole. And a Whole person craves nothing, but enjoys everything.
